name: Break it! (itch) (Achilleas90)
description:
This is a simple breakout clone I made following the instructions of "Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D " in Udemy.

Score resets when you lose, but you can continue from the level you lost.

Controls:

Mouse to move paddle.

Left Click to launch ball.

V1.1 Changes

Fixed random ball movements

Fixed paddle collider so now ball doesn't get stuck

Changed frustrating level 2
